* Login with invalid user
* Login with username (special characters)

*Italic*

Name: Scripted test AI
Description: Scripted test generated by AI (Smart Fox)
Author: Cristiano Cunha
Step description: Start the application to test the baseline state before performing any scripted actions.
Step expected_results: The application launches successfully and presents the initial screen.

Step description: Use the navigation menu to go to Feature X, which is to be tested.
Step expected_results: The Feature X page is displayed correctly without any errors.

Step description: Enter the required test data in the input fields for Feature X.
Step expected_results: The data is accepted by the input fields without validation errors.

Step description: Trigger the function linked with Feature X using the appropriate action (e.g., click the 'Run' button).
Step expected_results: The function executes as expected, and the appropriate success message is displayed.

Step description: Check the output or changes caused by the execution of Function in Feature X.
Step expected_results: The output or changes are as per the expected outcomes defined in the test case.
